price: (109) Said the eminent among the people of Pharaoh, "Indeed, this is a learned magician
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmi fir'ʿawna inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
